description:
This rad bike is great for building skills and ripping around the block with one-speed simplicity. The combination of coaster brake and rear v-brake allow kids to learn "big kid" braking without losing the coaster they're used to.

  • Cannondale alloy frame is exceptionally lightweight and durable with high-quality welds
  • Tapered steel fork for precise steering and forgiving ride feel
  • Single speed drivetrain is easy to use and low maintenance
  • Coaster brake and rear V-brake for quick intuitive stops
  • Chainguard protects pants from grease
  • Wide tires with multi-surface tread for a smooth ride
  • Ergonomic saddle and grips
  • Flat pedals with reflectors
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
name: Cannondale Trail Single-Speed 20" Bicycle - Children to Youths
